object.name: ChatMemberAdministrator
object.description: Represents a chat member that has some additional privileges.
object.html_description: Represents a chat member that has some additional privileges.
object.rst_description: Represents a `chat member <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#chatmember>`_ that has some additional privileges.

annotations.description: The member's status in the chat, always 'administrator'
annotations.html_description: The member's status in the chat, always “administrator”
annotations.rst_description: The member's status in the chat, always 'administrator'
annotations.name: status

annotations.description: True, if the bot is allowed to edit administrator privileges of that user
annotations.html_description: True, if the bot is allowed to edit administrator privileges of that user
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the bot is allowed to edit administrator privileges of that user
annotations.name: can_be_edited

annotations.description: True, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.html_description: True, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user's presence in the chat is hidden
annotations.name: is_anonymous

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can access the chat event log, chat statistics, message statistics in channels, see channel members, see anonymous administrators in supergroups and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can access the chat event log, chat statistics, message statistics in channels, see channel members, see anonymous administrators in supergroups and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can access the chat event log, chat statistics, message statistics in channels, see channel members, see anonymous administrators in supergroups and ignore slow mode. Implied by any other administrator privilege
annotations.name: can_manage_chat

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can delete messages of other users
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can delete messages of other users
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can delete messages of other users
annotations.name: can_delete_messages

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can manage video chats
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can manage video chats
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can manage video chats
annotations.name: can_manage_video_chats

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can restrict, ban or unban chat members
annotations.name: can_restrict_members

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that they have promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by the user)
annotations.html_description: True, if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that they have promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by the user)
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the administrator can add new administrators with a subset of their own privileges or demote administrators that they have promoted, directly or indirectly (promoted by administrators that were appointed by the user)
annotations.name: can_promote_members

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to change the chat title, photo and other settings
annotations.name: can_change_info

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.html_description: True, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.rst_description: :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to invite new users to the chat
annotations.name: can_invite_users

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can post in the channel; channels only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the administrator can post in the channel; channels only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the administrator can post in the channel; channels only
annotations.name: can_post_messages

annotations.description: True, if the administrator can edit messages of other users and can pin messages; channels only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the administrator can edit messages of other users and can pin messages; channels only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the administrator can edit messages of other users and can pin messages; channels only
annotations.name: can_edit_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to pin messages; groups and supergroups only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to pin messages; groups and supergroups only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to pin messages; groups and supergroups only
annotations.name: can_pin_messages

annotations.description: True, if the user is allowed to create, rename, close, and reopen forum topics; supergroups only
annotations.html_description: Optional. True, if the user is allowed to create, rename, close, and reopen forum topics; supergroups only
annotations.rst_description: *Optional*. :code:`True`, if the user is allowed to create, rename, close, and reopen forum topics; supergroups only
annotations.name: can_manage_topics
